user.title: Fill in your Coway IoCare account credentials

data.username: Coway IoCare account email or phone number

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate with your Coway IoCare account credentials

data.username: Coway IoCare account email or phone number

error.invalid_auth: Coway API authentication error: unable to retrieve auth 'code'. Likely due to invalid username/password.
error.password_expired: Coway servers are requesting a password change as the password on this account hasn't been changed for 60 days or more. Use the IoCare app to change your password. Otherwise, select the skip password change option.
error.server_maintenance: Coway servers are currently undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.
error.rate_limited: Your account has likely been rate-limited (blocked). Please wait 24 hours before attempting to set up the integration again. If, after 24 hours, you're unable to log in even with the mobile IoCare+ app, please contact Coway support.

abort.already_configured: Coway IoCare account is already configured
